name: TheEscapeRoom
description:
Welcome to the Escape Room

  Four friends after having a night out, on their way back were captured and forcefully drugged. In some few hours, they woke up in a room, dark before their eyes they were blindfolded with a bag on their heads.

  They then heard a voice that told them they will either live to see tomorrow or die depending on if they pass two tests given to them.

  The first was to correctly guess a number within a strict number of tries which will help them to open the door in the room and escape to the second stage, failure to do so will mean the door will never open and they will end up dying in the room.

  The second and maybe last is to find all hidden objects marked on a map that contains particular clues to leave the island where they are captured.

  Will they take the challenge and see a new day?
